ygData.subject: Fishing Rod
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been hearing a lot about people seeing collapsing fishing rods and the telescope that s made from them. But I seam to remember reading an article back
ygData.messageBody:
I've been hearing a lot about people seeing collapsing fishing rods and the
telescope that's made from them. But I seam to remember reading an article
back when I first started playing Everquest (that was back in July), about a
collapsing fishing rod that could be obtained from a quest or NPC some
where, don't remember where or what article it was.

That might be the source of all these sightings, and not someone who is too
selfish to share the info.

Tinkerten
Gnome Enchanter of the 20th Circle
